name: acetyl-CoA:enzyme N6-(dihydrolipoyl)lysine S-acetyltransferase
definition: Acetyl-CoA + Enzyme N6-(dihydrolipoyl)lysine <=> CoA + [Dihydrolipoyllysine-residue acetyltransferase] S-acetyldihydrolipoyllysine
comment: pyruvate dehydrogenase complex:dihydrolipoyllysine-residue acetyltransferase a part of multi-step reaction (see R00209, R01699+R02569+R07618) following after R01699
